attributes.action: Bring Football Manager Back To PS3/Xbox
attributes.additional_details:
In 2008 Football Manager was accessible by Xbox 360! This game was outstanding at the time of realese, It followed In the footsteps Of LMA Manager. All I am asking for Is your support to show SI Games that there Is a market for this game. Therefore hopefully we will see football manager on ps3/Xbox on the shelfs on many high street stores In the distance future.

Thanks,
Jordan Ward

@MrJordanWard - Twitter Account
